name: detect-browser
description: Unpack a browser type and version from the useragent string

scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && npm run postpublish
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish && npm run postpublish
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish && npm run postpublish

author: Damon Oehlman <damon.oehlman@gmail.com>
